title: Blind Side
description: The boys are back in town!   With resources already overstretched, the last thing Will and Taylor need is another client.  And the last thing Will needs is for that client to turn out to be an old boyfriend of Taylorâ€™s.  But Ashe Dekker believes someone is trying to kill him, and Taylor is determined to help--whatever the cost.
author: Josh Lanyon
